title: your thoughts on ranks for each role?
body: So from what I'm understanding, starting next season, we'l lbe having individual divisions for each role, so for ex: you could be platinum in mid but bronze at adc, what are your guys' thoughts on this change if this is what the actual plan is?

replies.body:
I think it's bad.

Climbing is already hard as it is.

Now I have to do it five times on five different roles?

Fuck me man.

If you get auto filled in a role you're not good with, it won't affect your main role, which is why they did this. 

AND YES,

I know the counter points to that logic. But a lot of people griped about being a "lolzor yolo mid lane yasuo one trick" main only or some shit and losing LP getting autofilled support.

BAD HOMBRES ON MANY SIDES

> [{quoted}](name=magewick,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=MAVsp6E0,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-07-19T20:56:27.154+0000)
>
> Kind of needed to happen given the elo backbone of matchmaking. Elo was never meant to track your skill at 5 different tasks at once.

And the current elo system is really easy to abuse with duo queuing. A lower rank support can duo with a higher rank botlaner (or similarly a low top and higher jungle) and abuse the fact that their team's total MMR will match their opponent's while the first team is only allocating their MMR to carry roles and the latter has a higher rank noncarry which will have a lesser impact on the game.

just why separate ranks? what makes it worse is that there'll likely be a system to find a middle ground for a rank total of sorts, and since adc's suck for the last 2-5 patches, it's near impossible to get a high rank in those conditions.

Im not saying seperate ranks. Im saying its a good concept, but maybe the developers would come  up with a great way of executing it. The main thing is ranking up and the ranking system in general needs an overhaul and thats the whole point of this conversation, making ranks based on the role you play is just an idea of how they could redo it. lets not forget people thought having a main and primary role before starting matchmaking in solo que wouldnt be possible, but that happened...Maybe they could try it in Clash, I don't know but I  think it would work best there if it were to be tried out
